headlines.description: Leicester City and Chelsea played out an entertaining 2-2 draw on Saturday with goals from Antonio Rudiger, Harvey Barnes and Ben Chilwell.
headlines.shortLinkText: Chelsea and Leicester fight out entertaining 2-2 draw

headlines.description: Bournemouth climbed out of the Premier League relegation zone after they held on for a 2-1 win over Aston Villa at the Vitality Stadium on Saturday,
headlines.shortLinkText: Bournemouth beat Villa to climb out of drop zone

headlines.description: A terrible blunder from Crystal Palace goalkeeper Vicente Guaita helped Sheffield United to a 1-0 Premier League victory at Selhurst Park.
headlines.shortLinkText: Goalkeeper howler gifts Sheffield United 1-0 win

headlines.description: Liverpool need just seven more wins to claim the Premier League after beating Southampton 2-0 at Anfield.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool beat Saints to take step closer to title

headlines.description: Newcastle had goalkeeper Martin Dubravka to thank as they climbed to 10th spot in the table with a draw against Norwich.
headlines.shortLinkText: Newcastle climb to 10th with draw against Norwich

headlines.description: Everton fought back from two goals down at Watford to earn a remarkable 3-2 win with just 10 men in the Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: 10-man Everton seal remarkable comeback win at Watford

events.name: Brighton & Hove Albion at West Ham United

headlines.description: West Ham United slipped into the Premier League relegation zone after giving up a two-goal lead as they were held 3-3 at home to Brighton.
headlines.shortLinkText: Hammers fall to stunning Brighton comeback for 3-3 draw

headlines.description: Manchester United's new signing Bruno Fernandes was in action as his side struggled to a goalless draw against Wolves at Old Trafford on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man United held by Wolves on Fernandes debut
